alert.note: Alert for Lenawee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 11:40PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lenawee County through 1245 AM EDT... At 1139 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Burlington to near Bronson to 10 miles northeast of Rome City. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Addison around 1210 AM EDT. Hudson, Morenci and Cement City around 1215 AM EDT. Onsted and Clayton around 1220 AM EDT. Adrian and Tecumseh around 1225 AM EDT. Blissfield around 1230 AM EDT. Deerfield and Britton around 1235 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Seneca, Manitou Beach-Devils Lake, Macon, Lime Creek, Munson, Ogden Center, Canandaigua, Ridgeway, Palmyra and Tipton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
